title: Set maximum word count to 2000 words

requirements.text: Add a maximum word count limit of 2000 words to the main writing textarea on the WritingPage, preventing users from typing beyond this limit and displaying the count as 'X / 2000' format

quotes: keep the maximum word count as 2000

acceptanceCriteria: The textarea on WritingPage enforces a 2000 word maximum
Users cannot type or paste text that would exceed 2000 words
The word count display shows current count out of 2000 (e.g., '1543 / 2000')
When the limit is reached, further typing is blocked
The word count indicator remains visible and updates in real-time as the user types

constraints: Do not change the existing word count calculation logic in useWordCount hook
Preserve the current visual styling and layout of the WritingPage
Maintain compatibility with existing save/load functionality
nonGoals: Changing word count limits for other text fields (character descriptions, etc.)
Adding warning messages or alerts about approaching the limit
Modifying the PDF export or flipbook generation logic
